title: Pride and Protests
description:
DJ Lou tells the gang about his girlfriend's birthday weekend full of protests and pride. The guys discuss the new Who's The Boss reboot and remind us that not all the New Kids can still sing.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
